name: execute_code
description: Executes a string of Python code and captures its output.

code_string.description: A string containing the Python code to execute.

name: execute_script
description: Executes a Python script from a file and captures its output.

script_path.description: The path to the Python script to execute.

name: write_to_file
description:
Writes content to a specified file.

This function automatically detects the content type and opens the file
in the appropriate mode.
- If 'content' is a string, it writes in text mode ('w').
- If 'content' is bytes, it writes in binary mode ('wb').
This function will overwrite the file if it already exists.

file_path.description: The full path to the file to be written.

content.description: The content to write to the file.
